title: app fail
body: updated this morning the got an error (0xc000005) what is  going on and how do I fix it?

replies.body: There's a few different things that can cause that 0xc000005 error, so let's make sure to cover all of our bases. There's a few different steps in our [**patching issues guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), but make sure to go through them all paying close attention to the "Troubleshooting Issues" section. Hit me back up if that doesn't seem to be helping though!
